entry.title: The Marriage Council
entry.summary:
Author: Asterope03

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,796Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 40

Summary: The Marriage Council blends the social drama and matchmaking chaos of Bridgerton with the characters of Merlin, reimagined in a world without magic. Arthur is pressured to choose a bride from ten noble princesses sent to Camelot, each more strategic than the last. But as alliances form and gossip spreads, it becomes clear that Arthur’s heart may lie elsewhere, and not with a princess at all.

entry.title: Like Poison
entry.summary:
Author: toinkeroo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,410Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 323

Summary: I feel like the worst kind of idiot, for not noticing sooner. For letting myself get tricked into believing that it was all actually real.   I would stop time;  if I try I think I could. I would keep you here, asleep in front of me, still in love with me.  --UPDATED with Like Mercy (Chapter 2), a companion piece from Merlin's POV.

entry.title: Enchanted by Accident
entry.summary:
Author: TruePotatio

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: The kingdom of Camelot….Such a weird place….In this kingdom there lives a king, or better said… a soon to be king, Arthur Pendragon and let’s not forget about his personal manservant, Merlin…You probably already know the story already, but let’s recap for the fun of it, because why not…In Camelot, magic is prohibited, but Merlin has magic because it makes sense. Merlin is a warlock, and is destined to protect Arthur with his magic which also makes sense. Arthur’s destiny was to become king and bring back magic. Oh, Merlin is also called Emrys by the druids which just means immortal.That’s your summary of the day, makes sense. Great, on with the story… Inspired by @teefscrubz on TikTok orapollosdagger here on Ao3(I don't know what else to say)

entry.title: A Kingdom of Almosts
entry.summary:
Author: ex0rciqm1864

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,988Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: They call Camelot the empire of light and glory. I see it for what it is; a place where magic is feared, hunted, and buried with the bodies of those who dared to use it. I shouldn't be here. And yet, here I am.The laughter of children, the clatter of horses, the buzz of life; it all drowns out the quiet, suffocating breath of the hunted. Camelot thrives, but it thrives on silence. A nation that spills blood on account for peace. What a load of bullshit.

entry.title: A Magician and his King
entry.summary:
Author: Eliott_Marsh

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,902Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 84

Summary: He felt the hairs on the back of his neck stand-up. He wasn't alone. Before he could fully process this information, he was halfway across the room with his dagger at the throat of his manservant, who was snoring peacefully on Arthur's windowsill with a broom clutched in his elbow.He breathed in sharply, adrenaline ramping up a notch as he realized how close he had been to cutting Merlin's throat.Dropping the blade to his side, Arthur studied him. Merlin's long form collapsed in on itself to fit on the small shelf, his inky black hair curling against the morning dew that was gathering on the window panes. His thick eyelashes were fluttering lightly over his pale cheeks and one of his hands was twitching, but he slept soundly.OR: The Merthur fic you didn't know you needed.

entry.title: Not a Dream, After All
entry.summary:
Author: irenes_heart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,050Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 146

Summary: Merlin visits Lake Avalon every year on the anniversary of Arthur's death. Every year, he makes the same wish - that he would once again be reunited with Arthur.Merlin lies down in the grassy outcrop that replaced the dried up lake and dreams of Arthur. He still thinks he's dreaming when Lake Avalon fills back up with thrashing, frigid water and threatens to take him away from the land of the living.When Merlin is drowning, he dreams of Arthur's face. He dreams that he feels Arthur's strong arms holding him once again, pulling him from the grasp of the lake and onto the safety of the shoreline.Merlin still thinks he's dreaming when Arthur speaks to him and reassures him that he's here to stay. It's almost too real for Merlin to handle.But, what if it wasn't a dream, after all?*updating as I write*

entry.title: Le Morte d'Arthur: Destiny Calls
entry.summary:
Author: elfinnemrys

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,995Chapters: 16/31Kudos: 34

Summary: Merlin has been wandering for centuries. Waiting for the exact, unknown time that Arthur shall rise again.He becomes a lady of King Henry VIII.He meets Robin Hood and they share a fondness that once reminded him of a certain Prince.He bumps into Matthew Hopkins, the Witchfinder General, more times than he would like, dying a different death each time.But he always comes back.He falls in love and, in turn, becomes a father, a grandfather, and a lonely old man still waiting, waiting, waiting.But this is Matty's story - Merlin's granddaughter. And the ghost of Arthur follows her everywhere.This fic is completed, so don't worry about me not updating it. All in due time :)

entry.title: Of Legends and (Rugby) Kings
entry.summary:
Author: grlnxtdr29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,285Chapters: 18/35Kudos: 34

Summary: The problem with Legends is that, over time, they are altered, misremembered, or forgotten all together. But some Legends are so great, they must be relived, again and again, until they get it right.Nick dreams only of being the Rugby King of Truham Grammar. Beyond that, he has no idea what he wants to do with his future. Until he meets a boy with curly hair, blue eyes, and dimples.Charlie dreams of Dragons, and Magick, of brave Knights, and a quest set before him, to bring back the olde ways, and set right the Legend that has been retold thousands of times. This time, he vows to set the record straight (Or not so straight.)Who knew their Destinies would collide?

entry.title: Void Noir
entry.summary:
Author: Conncrete

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,647Chapters: 5/11Kudos: 133

Summary: Agravaine's treason has been revealed at last. But this is only the beginning for Arthur Pendragon, for forces he can't hope to understand conspire to take the throne, and he won't be able to defend it alone.Merlin Emrys has left Camelot behind him. Or so he thinks. When faced with the hardest decision in his life, he'll have to decide what is most important to him.--Merthur EndgameCanon-Divergence
